description: This file defines a React functional component 'TagFilter' that displays a list of tags with checkboxes, allowing users to filter notes based on selected tags. It handles sorting tags, toggling selection, and rendering the UI.

methods.name: TagFilter({ tags, active, onChange })
methods.description: React functional component that renders tag checkboxes for filtering notes. Handles sorting tags, toggling selection, and clearing filters.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Function to toggle the presence of a tag in the active tags list.
